column4: Is there a way to "translate" in xorg language the screen configuration of the windows nvidia control center?
i know i repeat myself but theres people coming inside
mabe they know
Is there a way to "translate" in xorg language the screen configuration of the windows nvidia control center?
i mean the values of that configuration
if you're using the nvidia restricted driver, there is also a special nvidia settings editor program
you can install the "nvidia-settings" package
ive got the nvidia-settings and nvidia-clock installed, but theres no way of making a customized configuration as in windows
is there something in particular you're trying to configure that you don't see there?
i've got the values of the windows program, i just don't know where to put them
yes
the screen
well, what about the screen?  the nvidia setting application has many configuration fields
windows control center has a personalized screen section built in
i know
but mabe theres a way to fill in that values by hand directly into xorg
I imagine that the configuration file format isn't exactly the same between windows and Linux
so the screen works smoothly
I'm not aware of any direct "translation" utility
refresh rates
horizontal sync
etc...
active horizontal pixels
the settings for nvidia are saved in the fiile ~/.nvidia-settings-rc -- you can check this file to see if the format is similar to Windows
